page.title: 08Choppington First School
page.content: In June 1912, the School we know as Choppington First School was opened. It was built of red bricks. Seventy three years on it is like this. There are 5 classes, 5 teachers, 1 part time teacher, 1 head teacher, an auxiliary and a secretary. We have a hall, a head teachers room, 1 staff room, 2 cloakrooms - 1 boys and 1 girls. We have a playing field and 2 playgrounds. This school takes children from about 5 years old until they go to the middle school at 9 years old. In class 1 we begin to read and write and to count. We play games, sing, paint, and play with the sand and water. In classes 2,3,4, and 5 we add to our learning, preparing us for the middle school.
